Author: rosecoloredidiot
Text: Right, tho? It's kinda sick how excited I am about it hahaha.      You're right, it's probably not as much of a codependent behavior as I think it is. Just super weird thinking about. ðŸ™‚

Author: DenimWizard
Text: I would probably do the same in your situation. Like I'm excited just imagining it, yikes.  But I just wanted to comment that there's nothing wrong or codependent about feeling anxious that he's going away, everyone feels like that in this situation, especially if you're not used to it!
